text: The men's 100 metres event at the 2007 European Athletics U23 Championships was held in Debrecen, Hungary, at Gyulai István Atlétikai Stadion on 12 and 13 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Simeon Williamson ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Craig Pickering ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Martial Mbandjock ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 13 July Wind: 0.2 m/s {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !! Name !! Nationality !! Time !!
